article_title: Priscilla Miller: MERCI Clinic, here to serve
article_text: By Priscilla Miller, Special to the Sun Journal

article_metadata.description: This year, 2016, is the 20th anniversary of the establishment of MERCI Clinic that provides primary medical care for adults from Craven, Jones and Pamlico counties who are of lesser income, without benefit of health insurance or are ineligible for Affordable Care coverage.
article_metadata.author: Priscilla Miller, Special to the Sun Journal
